attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP!it will send dog poop to your hose🤮👎🏼
attributes.review: I HATE THIS APP it’s the worst

attributes.title: doesn’t even deserve one star
attributes.review: this app was horrible!! i kept seeing an ugly orange guy pop up on my screen, i was forced to give my phone number, AND the app was laggy and horrible. the quality of the app is disgusting, and don’t even get me STARTED on the content. -178372828282/10!!!! i cant wait for november 3rd!!!! 🤮🤮🤮 get him out!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: all this app do is spam. thats so discouraging. then, i kept getting sexually explicit messages about Nikacado avocado. I searched the name and found out it was a youtube user. Are you kidding?! DISGUSTING! who runs this app? it's so unprofessional. Don’t waste your i time.

attributes.title: Terribly glitchy and so hard to use.
attributes.review: You think this was created my toddlers or some low IQ person.This app is sooo glitchy it might be the hate it radiates off of. But wow this is a terrible app. App needs to get this off of the store.

attributes.title: ugh
attributes.review: Absolutely unbelievable,it spammed my phone for HOURS AND HOURS,and it wouldn’t stop. Also it made my phone very slow😤😭.It took up 10 GIGABYTES.And it also it somehow communicated with the rats🙄😨.They ALWAYS come up to me and ask for trumps nudes😔😹.NEVER GET THIS APP ITS HORRIBLE.
